name: OrderActionStep
comment: Contains  details of steps that have been performed as a part of an order action. A Step is the lowest level of an order and every order action can have one or more pre-defined steps.
vf short description: Contains  details of steps that have been performed as a part of an order action. A Step is the lowest level of an order and every order action can have one or more pre-defined steps.

fields.name: OrderActionStepSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: OrderActionStepKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the order action step in ALDM. Each order action step key value represents a unique order action step.

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionModeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionStepCategorySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionStepStateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: DueDate
fields.comment: Indicates the assignment execution due date.

fields.name: ExecutionDate
fields.comment: Indicates the assignments execution date.

fields.name: CompletionDate
fields.comment: Indicates the assignment execution completion date.

fields.name: PerformerEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was created in the source system

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was modified in the source system

fields.name: FormId
fields.comment: Indicates a unique identifier of the form related to the assignment. This Id is relevant for negotiation assignments only.

fields.name: ModificationEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionInterimStatusInd
fields.comment: Specifies the interim status value of the order action when the order action step is being performed. To handle a back situation, this attribute value is set to 2 after the order action step is complete.

fields.name: FirstExecutionDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which an assignment was executed for the first time.

fields.name: HoldDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which an order activity will be resumed.

fields.name: AssignmentConfigInd
fields.comment: Indicates whether the Assigned Product is related to a quantity, in quantity, or regular order action. Values are:Q - QuantityI - In quantityR - Regular

fields.name: PriorityCode
fields.comment: Indicates the priority of the execution of the assignment.

fields.name: FailedExecutionFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the assignment failed during execution.

fields.name: OrderActionStepId
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the order action step in the source system.

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
